title: Day One
description: "I read the entire story grinning ear to ear and even finished it with happy tears. In fact, I started trying to slow down at the end because I didn’t want it to be over. Day One by Lauren Runow totally broke my reading slump and I look forward to reading more of her books." - Ana's Attic Book BlogI reactivated my Tinder account out of pure boredom. Getting a private message surprised me, but when I saw Drew’s profile photo I decided to hit Reply anyway.Our first texts intrigued me.Our first phone call excited me.We’re set to meet until I turn on the television and see him there. The man I’m falling hard for is more than the hot guy in the profile.He’s baseball’s newest all-star.And tonight he’s all mine.
author: Lauren Runow
